mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAVI_CERTIFICATED_BOARD VALUES(#{memberId}, CERTIFICATED_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{certificatedTitle}, #{certificatedContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CERTIFICATEDNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM DAVI_CERTIFICATED_BOARD ORDER BY CERTIFICATEDNUM DESC) WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, D.* FROM (SELECT * FROM DAVI_CERTIFICATED_BOARD ORDER BY CERTIFICATEDNUM DESC) D) F WHERE F.R BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
